alert.note: Alert for Northern Newton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 3:31PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Vernon Parish in west central Louisiana and northeastern Newton Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 331 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 13 miles east of Many to near Hornbeck to 6 miles north of Toledo Bend Dam. Movement was southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Leesville, Anacoco, Toledo Bend Dam, Slagle, Fort Polk, New Llano, Hornbeck, Kurthwood, Hutton, Burr Ferry, Simpson and Evans. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
